mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_cart (product_id, user_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT pc.cart_id, p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_script FROM product_cart pc JOIN products p ON pc.product_id = p.product_id WHERE pc.user_id = #{userId}
